verses.verse: In my <S%H6869>distress,<s%> I <S%H7121>cried<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> He answered <S%H6030>me.<s%>
What will be <S%H5414>given<s%> to <S%H3254>you,<s%> and what will be done more to <S%H7423>you,<s%> you deceitful <S%H3956>tongue?<s%>
<S%H190>Woe<s%> is <S%H1481>me,<s%> that I live in <S%H4902>Meshech,<s%> that I <S%H7931>dwell<s%> among the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar!<s%>
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> has had her <S%H7931>dwelling<s%> too <S%H7227>long<s%> with him who <S%H8130>hates<s%> <S%H7965>peace.<s%>
I am for <S%H7965>peace,<s%> but when I <S%H1696>speak,<s%> they are for <S%H4421>war.<s%>
